title: Bold Condensed Sans
content:
Hi there,

Please can anyone ID this for me?

Thanks in advance  
R

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [29074606\_83333440225.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018044045/http:/typophile.com/files/29074606_83333440225.jpg) | 36.67 KB |

author: rtgbanks

comments.content: The angle on the top bar of the F is unique. Alternatives would be Tungsten or Compacta.
Thanks Chris. I thought of Compacta & Tungsten too, but the numbers are wrong.

Keep [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018044045/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q_16) in mind.  
Other than that it reminds me of [American Captain](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018044045/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontry/american-captain/).
